title: Art, Fiction, and Artificial Intelligence
description: NFT art start-up TR Lab chairwoman Xin Li-Cohen, who is also non-executive deputy chairman in Asia for Christie's, and artist Brendan Dawes, speak with Penta senior writer Abby Schultz about Dawes' artwork inspired by Stanley Qiufan Chen and Kai-Fu Lee's book, AI 2041: Ten Visions For Our Future.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: NFT art start-up TR Lab chairwoman Xin Li-Cohen, who is also non-executive deputy chairman in Asia for Christie's, and artist Brendan Dawes, speak with Penta senior writer Abby Schultz about Dawes' artwork inspired by Stanley Qiufan Chen and Kai-Fu Lee's book, AI 2041: Ten Visions For Our Future.
